nodes.text: Helical HyperCom utilized a production facility in the city Fucallpa on Lokori. The facility was protected by an energy shield that was provided by a massive shield generator. During the Clone Wars, a battle was fought on Lokori between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Galactic Republic. When the Separatists began to bomb Fucallpa, scientist Galen Erso suggested to his boss Roman Herbane that power be diverted from the facility to the shield generator so that a greater portion of the city could be protected.
